meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Grains</kanji> are made of single <vocabulary>grain</vocabulary>s. You can also use this to refer to a <vocabulary>bead</vocabulary> or use it as a <vocabulary>counter for grains</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You take all the <vocabulary>grain</vocabulary> and put it in a <reading>tube</reading> (つぶ). Just imagine doing this, grain by grain.
